name: stock_quote_price
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool financial_modeling_prep.
Tool description: Extensive Financial Data API covering more than 70,000 Stocks, ETFs, Mutual Funds and indexes! Real-time & Historical Data
API description: Fetches the real-time stock price for a given stock symbol using the Financial Modeling Prep API.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to fetch the real-time price.

apikey.description: The API key for authenticating with the Financial Modeling Prep API. Default is 'rapidapi'.
